LanguageData.PrisonLabor_Motivation.label: Motivation
LanguageData.PrisonLabor_Motivation.description: Motivation represents how motivated to work is prisoner. Motivation can be improved by colonists standing nearby.
LanguageData.PrisonLabor_Treatment.label: Treatment happiness
LanguageData.PrisonLabor_Treatment.description: Treatment happiness represents how prisoners are content of treatment in colony.
